Description.Text: Location This pleasant hotel lies directly beside Lanzada Beach, one of the most beautiful dune beaches in Galicia. Links to the public transport are a stone's throw away and shopping venues, restaurants, bars, pubs and nightclubs are all to be found in the town centre, which is roughly 7 km away. It is 8 km to the bus station whilst the nearest train station is 30 km away. Facilities The hotel was built in 1995. The establishment offers travellers a total of 54 rooms. Most storeys can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a restaurant, a café and a laundry service. The grounds of the accommodation feature a playground and an attractive garden. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. There is also a safe. Little extras, including a telephone, a TV and a radio, contribute to a great stay. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a bathtub. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an outdoor pool are available to guests. Meals Catering options available at the accommodation include bed and breakfast, half board and full board. Guests can choose to book options such as breakfast, lunch or dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.

This pleasant hotel lies directly beside Lanzada Beach, one of the most beautiful dune beaches in Galicia. Links to the public transport are a stone's throw away and shopping venues, restaurants, bars, pubs and nightclubs are all to be found in the town centre, which is roughly 7 km away. It is 8 km to the bus station whilst the nearest train station is 30 km away.

Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. There is also a safe. Little extras, including a telephone, a TV and a radio, contribute to a great stay. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a bathtub.

The hotel was built in 1995. The establishment offers travellers a total of 54 rooms. Most storeys can be reached by lift. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a restaurant, a café and a laundry service. The grounds of the accommodation feature a playground and an attractive garden. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel.
The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an outdoor pool are available to guests.
Catering options available at the accommodation include bed and breakfast, half board and full board. Guests can choose to book options such as breakfast, lunch or dinner.
The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
